content_descriptors.notes: This game contains skeletons, deceased people and other horrific visuals.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux distribution with Vulkan API
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060, AMD Radeon R9 480 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Linux distribution with Vulkan API
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-12400F or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 2070, AMD Radeon RX 6600XT or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12: Sierra or better
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 480 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12: Sierra or better
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-12400F or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600XT or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Cursed Dungeon Raider Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit or better
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060, AMD Radeon R9 480 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11 24H2
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-12400F or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 2070, AMD Radeon RX 6600XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Basque, Belarusian, Estonian, Hebrew, Icelandic, Catalan, Latvian, Lithuanian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian
*languages with full audio support
